tool_description: Builds detailed campaign rules and conditions based on discount strategies, including eligibility criteria, timing, and promotional mechanics.

discount_strategy.description: Identifier for the discount strategy to implement

eligibility_rules.description: Customer eligibility criteria for the campaign

promotion_type.description: Type of promotion: percentage_off, fixed_amount_off, buy_x_get_y, bundle_discount, tiered_discount

minimum_order_value.description: Minimum order value to qualify for promotion

maximum_uses_per_customer.description: Maximum times a customer can use this promotion

total_usage_limit.description: Total number of times promotion can be used across all customers

stackable_with_other_offers.description: Whether this promotion can be combined with other offers

error_messages: Invalid discount strategy: Discount strategy identifier not found or invalid.
Invalid promotion type: Use one of [percentage_off, fixed_amount_off, buy_x_get_y, bundle_discount, tiered_discount].
Invalid usage limits: maximum_uses_per_customer and total_usage_limit must be positive integers.
Invalid minimum order value: minimum_order_value must be a non-negative number.
Empty eligibility rules: At least one eligibility rule must be specified.
Campaign name conflict: Campaign name already exists or contains invalid characters.
usage: Provide discount_strategy, campaign_name, eligibility_rules, and promotion_type. Optionally set usage limits and stacking rules. Returns structured campaign rules ready for implementation.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the created campaign

validation_status.description: Whether all rules are valid and ready for deployment

estimated_reach.description: Estimated number of customers eligible for this campaign

rule_complexity_score.description: Complexity score of rules (1-10, higher means more complex)
